traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the {@condition charmed} condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The elf makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1 damage) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 10 (3d6 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) radiant damage.
